headers.subject: Re: Open link in new tab
headers.x-abuse-and-dmca-info: Please be sure to forward a copy of ALL headers
Otherwise we will be unable to process your complaint properly

body.para: On Tue, 18 Aug 2009 02:35:02 -0400, "Roger Fink" <fink@manana.org> wrote in <AfOdnZAPM57l1hfXnZ2dnUVZ_oCdnZ2d@mozilla.org>:

quote.quotepara: How do I get links in other apps to open in a new tab in FF 3.5.2 rather than an existing one?

body.para: I don't know how you do it with vanilla Firefox, but it's easy via the "links" tab in Tab Mix Plus, which is an add-on I'd recommend.
body.footer: -- Regards, Peter Boulding pjbnews1@UNSPAMpboulding.co.uk (to e-mail, remove "UNSPAM") Fractal Music and Images: http://www.pboulding.co.uk/ and http://www.soundclick.com/bands/default.cfm?bandID=794240&content=music
